ygData.messageBody:
In a message dated 7/8/99 2:09:59 PM Eastern Daylight Time, dark@...
writes:

> There are two Bloodclaw effects the first is a 20 point dd spell and the
> second is roughly a 80 point damage dot. I know th dot is there because
first
> I tried it out on some low level creatures like Pumas and as they ran they
> kept losing life I've also managed to kill a few lizzies in Cazic with the
> bloodclaw effect as they ran for help.

Sounds like poison or disease then :) (the level 16? disease spell does some
DD then DOT...)
